SEARCH
Package org.scictrl.mp.orbitcorrect.correction

Class OrbitCorrectionController

java.lang.Object
org.scictrl.mp.orbitcorrect.correction.OrbitCorrectionController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IConfigurable
public final class OrbitCorrectionController extends Object implements IConfigurable

Static part of OrbitCorrection procedure, holds references to models and data, which does not change through correction procedure.

Author:
igor@scictrl.com

    • maxNumberOfSteps

      protected int maxNumberOfSteps
      Maximum number of steps correction will make when applying correctors. 0 means all steps are applied.
